about_the_game:
Dive into Introversion Software’s creative process and the music (composed by Alistair Lindsay) behind the world’s most infamous prison management simulator.

Prison Architect - Aficionado contains:

  • Original Digital Artbook
  • Original Soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes:

linux_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Ubuntu 18 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era)
  • Hard Drive: 500 MB HD space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor:2009 era Macbook Pro, Core2 Duo processor
  • Memory:6 GB RAM
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space

name: Prison Architect - Aficionado

  • Processor:Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher
  • Memory:6 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia 8600 / Radeon equivalent (2009 era)
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space

short_description: Dive into Introversion Software’s creative process and the music (composed by Alistair Lindsay) behind the world’s most infamous prison management simulator. Prison Architect - Aficionado contains: Original Digital Artbook and Original Soundtrack.
